abort.already_configured: You have already configured an integration with this Webex email account.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Check your internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Ensure your auth token is from a bot at developer.webex.com/docs/bots
error.invalid_auth_token_type: You are using an invalid token type. Only bot tokens are valid. Personal Access Token's expire after a few hours and are not allowed.
error.email_not_found: Email provided is not a Webex user.

user.description:
